Title: Silverlight menu control using popup free user control
Description:
A silverlight menu custom control, a modified version of the control by mherdotinfo (http://slmenu.codeplex.com).
This version uses popup control for the menu items to encounter the zIndex issues.
Tested on silverlight3 and silverlight4
